column5: Took my 8yr old  son out today for his first ice fishing trip,I wanted to stay close to home incase he didnt like it .It was a tough bite only had a few hits today and really didnt see much on the vex ,but he managed to hook into his PB perch just over 14" [/img] [/img] [/img]
Whoa!! That's a great perch!! Congrats to the little guy!!
nothin better than a mohawk and a huge perch ....  Congrats !!!!
Great report and pics FISHINGNUT  WOW a 14"er at his first.... Beautiful    Congratulations to your son for his PB and thanks for sharing Leechman
what a brute ,, way to go .  proud young man right there !!
HUGE perch there young one. WTG.
I hope you're signing the young lad up for an OFC team  The look of pride on his face says it all

That monster was a bit of a tussle, I'm sure.  Hope he enjoyed the meal, that is the real cap on the day.  I also hope your lad lives a full life of fishing, always trying to better that perch he caught when he was eight.
awesome stuff!  I'm sure dad was as proud as son.  Congrats to both of you.
thats a beauty! congrats on ya for gettting him out! i think hes gonna be hooked on it now!
Nice!!  Makes me hungry. 14" is a nice perch indeed.
Niiiiiice one!!!  Congrats!
Congrats to the little guy on his PB sure is a beauty  Rob
My biggest is only a 12" perch and he got a 14"!  Congrads
Very nice perch. I bet it'll taste even better. Congrats little dude   .
Thats a good perch anywhere ya go!!  WTG on getting one bigger than your old man!!! hahaha  Sinker
I think he hooked more than just a first ice fish, but a sport that will stick with him for ages to come! Congrats wee man on the monster perch!  Tell yer da' to catch up! haha
Congrats to the little fella !!!! thats a huge perch for sure !!! hey the smile says it all...cheers    hey dad you better get a pic of that perch blow it up and put a frame on it !!!!
That's one pig of a perch! Congrats to the little dude!
Thats a Monster for sure ....    Congrats
